name: EXTREME BALL BOUNCER DEMO
description:
Description

EXTREME BALL BOUNCER is a game targeted for mobile! The Items have been merged with the levels and will make the game more difficult.

Gameplay

The game can be played with a mouse and will also be available on Google Play soon.

Controls

This game can be controlled with only one left-mouse button, click left of the paddle to go left and click right to go right

Have Fun!

Greetings Appellux!
